abstract: A new version of the Kindle application for the iPhone is another sign that Amazon’s e-book ambitions go beyond Kindle devices.
snippet: A new version of the Kindle application for the iPhone is another sign that Amazon’s e-book ambitions go beyond Kindle devices.
lead_paragraph: In what sounds like a footnote to last week’s introduction of the Kindle DX, but could ultimately prove to be far more important, Amazon has released a new version of its Kindle application for the iPhone.

headline.main: Amazon Updates Its Kindle App for the iPhone
